Package game

Class MakeChoice

java.lang.Object
game.MakeChoice
public class MakeChoice extends Object
Class used to interact with the player when choices are available to them.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • determineQuantityToPickUp

      public static int determineQuantityToPickUp​(int inventoryCapacity, int numberOfItemsFound)
      Class method to determine the quantity of an item to pick up. Allows picking up less than the number found if there is not capacity ina player's inventory for all of them.
      Parameters:
      inventoryCapacity - Accepts the remaining inventory capacity as an integer.
      numberOfItemsFound - Accepts the number of items found as an integer.
      Returns:
      The number of items a player can fit in inventory as an integer.

    • makeChoice

      public static boolean makeChoice​(Choice choice, Item item, PlayerCharacter playerCharacter)
      Class method to orchestrate player interaction with an item.
      Parameters:
      choice - Accepts the choice to be made by the player as a Choice object.
      item - Accepts the item that is subject of the players choice as an Item object.
      playerCharacter - Accepts the player making the choice as a PlayerCharacter object.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player interacted with the item.

    • makeChoice

      public static boolean makeChoice​(Choice choice, Item item, PlayerCharacter playerCharacter, int numberOfItems)
      Class method to orchestrate player interacting with more than one of an item.
      Parameters:
      choice - Accepts the choice to be made by the player as a Choice object.
      item - Accepts the item that is subject of the players choice as an Item object.
      playerCharacter - Accepts the player making the choice as a PlayerCharacter object.
      numberOfItems - Accepts the number of items the player is interacting with as an integer.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player interacted with the item.

    • chooseToPickUpItem

      public static boolean chooseToPickUpItem​(PlayerCharacter playerCharacter, Item itemToPickUp, int numberOfItemsFound)
      Class method for a player to pick up a number of items.
      Parameters:
      playerCharacter - Accepts the player choosing whether or not to pick up the item(s) as a PlayerCharacter object.
      itemToPickUp - Accepts the item subject to being picked up as an Item object.
      numberOfItemsFound - Accepts the number of items the player found up as an integer.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player picked up the objects as a boolean.

    • takeAction

      public static boolean takeAction​(String userPrompt)
      Class method to allow the player to choose whether or not they want to take an action.
      Parameters:
      userPrompt - Accepts the prompt to show the player as a string.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player took an action as a boolean.

    • chooseToUseItem

      public static boolean chooseToUseItem​(PlayerCharacter playerCharacter, Item itemToUse)
      Class method for a player to pick up a number of items.
      Parameters:
      playerCharacter - Accepts the player choosing whether or not to use the item as a PlayerCharacter object.
      itemToUse - Accepts the item subject to being used by the player as an Item object.
      Returns:
      Whether or not the player used the item as a boolean.
